items.ollie.description: Practice your ollie and impress more follower while skating.
items.kickflip.description: Work on your kickflip skills and earn more passive follower.
items.treflip.description: Learning the treflip will draw a lot of attention in your local skate community.
items.laserflip.description: The laserflip will draw attention not just in your local area. Go learn it!
